mapper.select: SELECT roid, oid orderId, ord_no orderNo, order_time, return_time, return_no, return_type, return_price, remarks_info, creator_id, creator_name, creator_identityType, creator_phone, store_id storeId, store_code storeCode, store_structure_code storeStructureCode, cus_id customerId, cus_name customerName, cus_phone customerPhone, cus_type customerType, reason_info, return_pic, ord_type orderType, return_status, is_record_sales isRecordSales FROM ord_return_base_info WHERE return_no = #{returnNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ord_return_base_info (oid, ord_no, order_time, return_time, return_no, return_type, return_price, remarks_info, creator_id, creator_name, creator_identityType, creator_phone, store_id, store_code, store_structure_code, cus_id, cus_name, cus_phone, cus_type, reason_info, return_pic, ord_type, return_status,is_record_sales,sales_manager_id,sales_manager_store_id) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{orderNo}, #{orderTime}, #{returnTime}, #{returnNo}, #{returnType}, #{returnPrice}, #{remarksInfo}, #{creatorId}, #{creatorName,}, #{creatorIdentityType}, #{creatorPhone}, #{storeId}, #{storeCode}, #{storeStructureCode}, #{customerId}, #{customerName}, #{customerPhone}, #{customerType}, #{reasonInfo}, #{returnPrice}, #{orderType}, #{returnStatus},#{isRecordSales},#{salesManagerId},#{salesManagerStoreId})
mapper.update:
UPDATE ord_return_base_info
oid = #{orderId},
ord_no = #{orderNo},
order_time = #{orderTime},
return_time = #{returnTime},
return_no = #{returnNo},
return_type = #{returnType},
return_price = #{returnPrice},
remarks_info = #{remarksInfo},
creator_id = #{creatorId},
creator_name = #{creatorName},
creator_identityType = #{creatorIdentityType},
creator_phone = #{creatorPhone},
store_id = #{storeId},
store_code = #{storeCode},
store_structure_code = #{storeStructureCode},
cus_id = #{customerId},
cus_name = #{customerName},
cus_phone = #{customerPhone},
reason_info = #{reasonInfo},
return_pic = #{returnPic},
ord_type = #{orderType},
return_status = #{returnStatus},
is_record_sales = #{isRecordSales},
WHERE roid = #{roid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ord_return_billing (roid, return_no, pre_deposit, credit_money, st_pre_deposit, st_credit_money, st_subvention, online_pay, online_pay_type, cash, lb_quantity, seller_store_deposit) VALUES (#{roid}, #{returnNo}, #{preDeposit}, #{creditMoney}, #{stPreDeposit}, #{stCreditMoney}, #{stSubvention}, #{onlinePay}, #{onlinePayType}, #{cash}, #{leBiQuantity} ,#{sellerStoreDeposit})

INSERT INTO ord_return_billing_detail (roid, return_no,return_pay_type, return_money, into_amount_time, reply_code, refund_number, create_time, return_subject_id) VALUES (#{roid}, #{returnNo}, #{returnPayType}, #{returnMoney}, #{intoAmountTime}, #{replyCode}, #{refundNumber}, #{createTime}, #{returnSubjectId})
INSERT INTO ord_return_cash_coupon (ord_no, roid, ccid, is_return, purchase_price) VALUES (#{orderNo}, #{roid}, #{ccid}, #{isReturn}, #{purchasePrice})

INSERT INTO ord_return_product_coupon (ord_no, roid, return_no, pcid, gid, qty, return_qty, is_return, purchase_price, sku, goods_sign) VALUES (#{orderNo}, #{roid}, #{returnNo}, #{pcid}, #{gid}, #{qty}, #{returnQty}, #{isReturn}, #{purchasePrice}, #{sku}, #{goodsSign})

INSERT INTO ord_return_goods_info (roid, return_no, order_goods_id, gid, sku, sku_name, retail_price, vip_price, wholesale_price, settlement_price, return_price, return_qty, goods_Line_type, company_flag, goods_sign) VALUES (#{roid}, #{returnNo}, #{orderGoodsId}, #{gid}, #{sku}, #{skuName}, #{retailPrice}, #{vipPrice}, #{wholesalePrice}, #{settlementPrice}, #{returnPrice}, #{returnQty}, #{goodsLineType}, #{companyFlag}, #{goodsSign})

INSERT INTO ord_return_logistic_info (roid, return_no, delivery_type, return_store_code, return_store_name, return_store_address, delivery_time, delivery_clerk_no, delivery_clerk_id, delivery_clerk_name, rejecter, rejecter_phone, return_full_address, residence_name, delivery_province, delivery_city, delivery_county, delivery_street, detailed_address) VALUES (#{roid}, #{returnNO}, #{deliveryType}, #{returnStoreCode}, #{returnStoreName}, #{returnStoreAddress}, #{deliveryTime}, #{deliveryClerkNo}, #{deliveryClerkId}, #{deliveryClerkName}, #{rejecter}, #{rejecterPhone}, #{returnFullAddress}, #{residenceName},#{deliveryProvince}, #{deliveryCity}, #{deliveryCounty}, #{deliveryStreet}, #{detailedAddress})
mapper.update:
UPDATE ord_return_billing_detail
return_pay_type = #{returnPayType},
return_money = #{returnMoney},
into_amount_time = #{intoAmountTime},
currency_type = #{currencyType},
reply_code = #{replyCode},
refund_number = #{refundNumber}
WHERE roid = #{roid}
mapper.select:
SELECT roid roid, oid orderId, ord_no orderNo, order_time orderTime, return_time returnTime, return_no returnNo, return_type returnType, return_price returnPrice, remarks_info remarksInfo, creator_id creatorId, creator_name creatorName, creator_identityType creatorIdentityType, creator_phone creatorPhone, store_id storeId, store_code storeCode, store_structure_code storeStructureCode, cus_id customerId, cus_name customerName, cus_phone customerPhone, cus_type customerType, reason_info reasonInfo, return_pic returnPic, ord_type orderType, return_status FROM ord_return_base_info orbi
WHERE orbi.return_no LIKE concat('%',#{keywords},'%') OR orbi.creator_phone LIKE concat('%',#{keywords},'%')
ORDER BY orbi.return_time DESC

SELECT ogi.return_qty qty, ogi.return_price retailPrice, ogi.goods_line_type goodsType, gg.sku_name, gg.gid goodsId, gg.goods_specification, gg.cover_image_uri, gg.goods_unit FROM ord_return_goods_info AS ogi INNER JOIN gds_goods AS gg ON ogi.sku = gg.sku WHERE ogi.return_no = #{orderNumber}
mapper.update:
UPDATE ord_return_logistic_info
delivery_clerk_id = #{deliveryClerkId},
delivery_clerk_no = #{deliveryClerkNo},
delivery_clerk_name = #{deliveryClerkName},
delivery_clerk_Phone = #{deliveryClerkPhone},
WHERE return_no = #{returnNO}
mapper.select: SELECT id, ord_no, roid, ccid, is_return, purchase_price FROM ord_return_cash_coupon WHERE roid = #{roid}
SELECT id, ord_no, roid, return_no, pcid, gid, sku, qty, purchase_price, return_qty, is_return FROM ord_return_product_coupon WHERE roid = #{roid}
SELECT id, create_time, roid, return_pay_type, return_money, into_amount_time, reply_code, refund_number FROM ord_return_billing_detail WHERE roid = #{roid}

SELECT id, roid, return_no, pre_deposit, credit_money, st_pre_deposit, st_credit_money, st_subvention, online_pay, online_pay_type, cash, lb_quantity, seller_store_deposit FROM ord_return_billing WHERE return_no = #{returnOrderNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ord_return_jx_price_difference_return_details (roid, ord_no, return_no, create_time, store_id, store_code, sku, unit_price, return_qty, amount, refund_number) SELECT #{roid}, #{orderNumber}, #{returnNumber}, #{createTime}, #{storeId}, #{storeCode}, #{sku}, #{unitPrice}, #{returnQty}, #{amount}, #{refundNumber} FROM dual WHERE NOT exists(SELECT 1 FROM ord_return_jx_price_difference_return_details WHERE refund_number = #{refundNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT id, roid, ord_no, return_no, create_time, store_id, store_code, sku, unit_price, return_qty, amount, refund_number FROM ord_return_jx_price_difference_return_details WHERE return_no = #{returnNo}

SELECT roid roid, oid orderId, ord_no orderNo, order_time orderTime, return_time returnTime, return_no returnNo, return_type returnType, return_price returnPrice, remarks_info remarksInfo, creator_id creatorId, creator_name creatorName, creator_identityType creatorIdentityType, creator_phone creatorPhone, store_id storeId, store_code storeCode, store_structure_code storeStructureCode, cus_id customerId, cus_name customerName, cus_phone customerPhone, cus_type customerType, reason_info reasonInfo, return_pic returnPic, ord_type orderType, return_status FROM ord_return_base_info WHERE roid = #{roid};

SELECT roid roid, oid orderId, ord_no orderNo, order_time orderTime, return_time returnTime, return_no returnNo, return_type returnType, return_price returnPrice, remarks_info remarksInfo, creator_id creatorId, creator_name creatorName, creator_identityType creatorIdentityType, creator_phone creatorPhone, store_id storeId, store_code storeCode, store_structure_code storeStructureCode, cus_id customerId, cus_name customerName, cus_phone customerPhone, cus_type customerType, reason_info reasonInfo, return_pic returnPic, ord_type orderType, return_status FROM ord_return_base_info WHERE return_status = #{status}

SELECT roid roid, oid orderId, ord_no orderNo, order_time orderTime, return_time returnTime, return_no returnNo, return_type returnType, return_price returnPrice, remarks_info remarksInfo, creator_id creatorId, creator_name creatorName, creator_identityType creatorIdentityType, creator_phone creatorPhone, store_id storeId, store_code storeCode, store_structure_code storeStructureCode, cus_id customerId, cus_name customerName, cus_phone customerPhone, cus_type customerType, reason_info reasonInfo, return_pic returnPic, ord_type orderType, return_status FROM ord_return_base_info WHERE store_id = #{store}
SELECT id, create_time, roid, return_no, return_pay_type, return_money, into_amount_time, reply_code, refund_number FROM ord_return_billing_detail WHERE refund_number = #{refundNumber}
SELECT id, create_time, roid, return_no, return_pay_type, return_money, into_amount_time, reply_code, refund_number FROM ord_return_billing_detail WHERE return_no = #{returnNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ord_lifecycle (oid,ord_no,operation, post_status, operation_time) VALUES (#{oid}, #{orderNumber}, #{operation}, #{postStatus}, #{operationTime})
INSERT INTO ord_return_lifecycle (roid,return_no,operation, post_status, operation_time) VALUES (#{roid}, #{returnNo}, #{operation}, #{postStatus}, #{operationTime})
mapper.select: SELECT return_no from ord_return_base_info ore LEFT JOIN ord_base_info ob on ore.ord_no = ob.ord_no LEFT JOIN inter_wta_return_order_back_header wro ON wro.po_no = ore.return_no where ore.is_record_sales = #{flag} and wro.create_time > '2018-04-01 00:00:00'

SELECT SUM(orb.pre_deposit) as preDeposit,SUM(orb.credit_money) as creditMoney,SUM(orb.st_pre_deposit) as stPreDeposit, SUM(orb.st_credit_money) as stCreditMoney,SUM(orb.st_subvention) as stSubvention,SUM(orb.online_pay) as onlinePay, SUM(orb.cash) as cash,SUM(orb.lb_quantity) as leBiQuantity, SUM(orb.seller_store_deposit) as sellerStoreDeposit FROM ord_return_base_info ori LEFT JOIN ord_return_billing orb ON orb.return_no = ori.return_no WHERE ori.ord_no = #{orderNo} AND ori.return_status != 'CANCELED' GROUP BY ori.ord_no

SELECT roid, oid orderId, ord_no orderNo, order_time, return_time, return_no, return_type, return_price, remarks_info, creator_id, creator_name, creator_identityType, creator_phone, store_id storeId, store_code storeCode, store_structure_code storeStructureCode, cus_id customerId, cus_name customerName, cus_phone customerPhone, cus_type customerType, reason_info, return_pic, ord_type orderType, return_status, is_record_sales isRecordSales FROM ord_return_base_info WHERE ord_no = #{orderNo}
